name: Inverted (itch) (Tezy)
description:
Inverted is a new game that calling for amazement and joy of people who like stretch their brains. The main character of this puzzle by mysterious accident find himself in a castle full of solitude, fear and oblivion. Moreover his charismatic appearance and charm, he has a skill of changing gravity by his own will to avoid different traps and dangerous obstacles.

Inverted will make glad fans of all genres and all ages. You can enjoy excellent music and wonderful graphics, get lost in atmosphere that this game skilfully present to the gamers and just have a good time while playing.

Features of game:
- Professional design of levels
- Perfect music
- Graphics by expert at his job
- Many references an "easter eggs"
- Real hardcore in traditions of a genre
- Availability
- Intuitive menu
- Multitude of inimitable and unique levels
